prompt: Are there live translation software options for video chats like Zoom or Teams?

hidden_queries: live translation software for video chats Zoom Teams real-time translation options
software or tools that provide live subtitles/translation in Zoom or Microsoft Teams
metadata.generated_search_query: live translation software for video chats Zoom Teams real-time translation options

citation_mappings.claim_text: Yes — there are live translation options for video chats like Zoom and Microsoft Teams. They range from built-in platform features to third-party AI tools and even professional interpreter services. Here’s a clear breakdown: 1) Built-in platform features Zoom translated captions / interpretation: Zoom can show real-time translated captions in multiple languages if the host enables the feature and the account supports it (business/enterprise plans or add-on). Meeting participants can choose the language for on-screen captions. Zoom

Microsoft Teams live captions: Teams has live captions and subtitles that can detect speech in a meeting and display text. Some Teams plans and integrations offer live translated captions without extra tools. Microsoft Support

2) Third-party AI translation tools These tools plug into Zoom, Teams, and other platforms to provide real-time translation and subtitles: Wordly / Wordly AI Translation Agent: Adds real-time translation & captions for Zoom, Teams, Google Meet, Webex, etc., often without requiring downloads from participants. Zoom Marketplace+1
Talo: AI interpreter that claims real-time voice translation across Zoom, Teams, and Google Meet in ~60 languages. Talo
Transync AI: Provides live subtitles and voice translation on major conferencing tools. 同言翻译
Felo Subtitles: Real-time multilingual subtitles/transcription compatible with Zoom and Teams. Felo Subtitles
Other tools mentioned in industry roundups include JotMe, Wordly, Interprefy, Kudo, Maestra AI etc., with varying levels of real-time translation support. jotme.io

sources.title: 7 Best Tools for Multilingual Real-Time Translation in Video Calls
sources.snippet: One of the most notable tools for multilingual real-time translation in video calls is Zoom's Live Transcription & Interpretation feature. This tool utilizes AI to provide live captions and translations, making video calls more accessible.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 3) Human interpretation integrations Interprefy / Kudo: These services integrate with Teams/Zoom to bring live human interpreters into the meeting, which can be more accurate when nuance matters (corporate events, legal, conferences). Fora Soft

sources.title: Top 10 Real-Time Subtitle - Instant Caption Generator For Zoom, Teams ...
sources.snippet: Discover the top 10 real-time subtitle and caption tools for 2025, from built-in platform features to powerful AI meeting assistants. Compare accuracy, features, and pricing for Zoom, Teams, and Google Meet.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 4) Combined workflows Some setups combine built-in platform captions + AI assistants (e.g., Teams/Zoom native captions with an AI bot that translates and displays text) for better coverage. ScreenApp
Quick considerations before you choose Accuracy vs latency: Real-time AI translation may lag or misinterpret complex terms. Human interpretation is better for precision but costlier. Tactiq
